name: Weighted Deadbug
setup: Lie on back with arms up holding a light weight above chest
Hips/knees at 90°; gently press low back to floor with an exhale
steps: Maintain brace and extend opposite arm (with/without weight) and leg toward floor
Pause near end range without losing lumbar contact
Return with control and alternate sides
cues: Ribs down; breathe out to brace
Only go as far as you can keep back flat
mistakes: Elbows locked hard while gripping weight overhead
safety: Use very light loads. Stop if back irritation. Reduce range or switch to bodyweight deadbug if form slips.

regressions: Heels on box with alternating arms

prescriptionHints.notes: Quality trumps load. Maintain lumbar contact with the floor.
